title: I feel like some champs limit my progress in climbing
body:
I really like Jayce and use him quite a lot, but I feel he takes too long to ramp up and relies on a lot of mana (a bit like ap kog) 

Shen is also fun to use but it is impossible to use him when your mid laner sits in lane with 100 hp and makes you eyeball them... also the hell long cd ult and low damage potential (tanks aren't rly good in solo queue I suppose)

Nasus is very strong but once again, he takes awhile to ramp up, but in essence he is easier to snowball with than Jayce because his wither makes ganking for a jungler pretty easy. I like him more than Jayce because of his all in potential too (jayce is about whittling them down and using tonnes of mana)

J4 seems like a pretty solid pick for snowballing the f*ck out of the top lane and scales well into the mid/late game, he is great if you can actually burst people down or they don't dash through your ult. 

Riven - Been considering maining her for awhile now, she has 4 gap closers is manaless, has pretty decent all in potential mid game and good bursts of damage in the early game. I am just worried of champions like Rammus, even if I get ahead  by a lot they are a real nuisance. 

Swain - he is a really good lane bully and can sustain with double dorans + roa, his kill potential with flash > e > q > w >  r ignite is awesome, his only downside is long range champions and inability to roam because of bad clear. (consider maxing his aoe w if you snowball)

replies.body:
learn 2-3 champions for every role, once learnt, focus on mastering, forget the rest

i top yorick teemo and malphite, between those 3 i can take on any top laner, and if one of them is picked one of the others counters

i mid veigar katarina and mordekaiser, again you see a pretty decent variety

junge - yi/xin/warwick/rammus/eve/udyr

supp - raka/sona/morg/voli/blitz/leo/malphite etc etc

adc - mf/ashe/cait/vayne

just set yourself up with a decent pool for each lane, even if you pick in to counters, honstly ive picked right in to a top counter because i didnt want to trial a new champ in ranked and done just fine.

long story short, the only thing limiting you climbing, is you.

Never have i seen a Yorick.

And i've been playing for a year.

Underrated...

he's severely under-rated, he is a massive lany bully to almost everybody other than jayce and morde, and the only champ ive seen straight duel him and win is volibear b/c he just confuses the ghouls and wrecks yorick after that lol

Jayce is pretty dependant on mana.

That's why the 1000mana in {{item:3042}} is very very helpful.
